requirements.question: DDoS: Watch an anime with the format “TV” and a popularity of 40,404 or more
Zero-Day Exploit: Watch an anime that started releasing on a date ending in 0 (YYYY-MM-DD format)
Permissions Override: Watch an anime with the format “Music” or the genre “Hentai”
Security Breach: Watch an anime with any of the tags: “Software Development”, “Artificial Intelligence”, “Espionage” or “Crime”
Invalid Character: Watch an anime with a character that does not appear on the standard QWERTY keyboard in its English or Romaji title
Watch an anime in which a character uses a laptop or desktop computer
Malicious Code: Watch an anime that has a review scoring it 60% or lower
Software Update: Watch an anime that you or another gambler received from AWCbotchan in the Gambler’s Challenge 2.0
HACKERMAN: Watch an anime with a male main character who wears glasses
Watch an anime with the format “ONA”
